info.title: odmObject ecomode

ecomode.description:
This odmObject specifies the supported and currently active Eco Mode of a Device
The Resource is a deriviative of the Mode Resource (mode) with a restriction that the population of supportedmodes and modes Properties is restricted to the set of values:
"disabled","enabled","notsupported".
The adminforced Property indicates that the value has been set by another party (e.g. via some offboard Smart Energy interaction)
ecomode.name: ecomode

adminforced.description: The indicator that the current mode of operation has been forced by admin action.
adminforced.name: admin forced

modes.description: The array of the currently active mode(s).
modes.name: modes

supportedModes.description: The array of possible modes the device supports.
supportedModes.name: supported modes
